body: I was just temp banned for no reason, it said for team spleefing (I was temp banned by MLGPorky) But first of all, What is team spleefing? And second of all, I was just going around hitting people with swords, Why did you temp ban me?
body_tagged: I was just temp banned for no reason, it said for team spleefing (I was temp banned by MLGPorky) But first of all, What is team spleefing? And second of all, I was just going around hitting people with swords, Why did you temp ban me?
title: Temp Banned for no reason?

replies.body: Also can somebody unban me because I didn't do anything, I'm not lying and I actually don't know what team spleefing is.
replies.body_tagged: Also can somebody unban me because I didn't do anything, I'm not lying and I actually don't know what team spleefing is.

replies.body:
I was spectating you, and you were breaking blocks from under a teammate, causing him to fall into the void and die.
That is called "Team Spleefing".

If you wish to appeal, you may use the link that 99250 posted above. ^

Good luck with your appeal.
